sentence.Network_en: They would not in the end abandon their vital interests by succumbing to Soviet blandishment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们最终决不会受苏联人的甜言蜜语的诱惑,从而抛弃自己的切身利益.

sentence.Network_en: Under no circumstances must he lent himself to any additional blandishment or languishments in this field.
sentence.Network_cn: 在任何情况下,他决不再来那一套花言巧语或是装作多情了.

sentence.Network_en: You know, blandishment ceaselessly cannot be done by everyone.
sentence.Network_cn: 要知道, 时刻地讨好,谁也做不到.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... besmirch 诽谤>尊敬 blandishment 奉承>威胁 blatant 喧哗的，无耻的>不明显的/无印象的/客气的，谦虚的.

list.abs: China has never renounced what it says is its right to take Taiwan by force if peaceful blandishments fail .中国从未放弃使用武力夺取台湾，如果和平途径失败的话。
teacher娟日志 - 青岛姑娘 - 昂立教师BLOG ... ... 缺陷： flaw;defect 花言巧语： blandishments;fine rhetoric;deceiving words.
She charmed the visitor with the arsenal of her blandishments ., 她用无数的甜言蜜语迷住了访客.
英语同义词_徒工_新浪博客 ... fawn 巴结,奉承,讨好 blandish 谄媚,奉承 obey 服从,听从,遵守.

means.word_mean: 2. the act of urging by means of teasing or flattery
